labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The hidden channels are moved between the visible channels
data.expected_result: The channel is moved to where the user specifies
data.short_description: Channels seem to randomly swap places if a user moves a channel, while also not having permission to view others
data.steps_to_repro: - Create multiple channels that are only visible to a certain role or user - a user that cannot see these channels moves another channel
